title: A Lost Steinbeck Story Resurfaces 40 Years After Author's Death
teaser: A short story by John Steinbeck that had never been published before was recently discovered by Andrew Gulli, editor of The Strand magazine. NPR's Arun Rath talked with Gulli about the find.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
